pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Batch Effects // Software which provides numerous functionalities for detecting and removing group-level effects from high-dimensional scientific data which, when combined with additional assumptions, allow for causal conclusions, as- described in our manuscripts Bridgeford et al. (2024) doi:10.1101/2021.09.03.458920 and Bridgeford et al. (2023) arXiv:2307.13868. Also provides a number of useful utilities for generating simulations and balancing covariates across multiple groups/batches of data via matching and propensity trimming for more than two groups.
